alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:24PM EDT until June 15 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Huron County in north central Ohio... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 722 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Castalia, or near Sandusky, moving east at 40 mph. Additional storms are developing near Freemont and Bellevue. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. There have been numerous reports of large hail and wind damage with this thunderstorms over parts of Ottawa and Sandusky Counties. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Norwalk, Fremont, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Port Clinton, Bellevue, Clyde, Oak Harbor, Elmore, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Castalia, Ballville, Catawba Island, Monroeville, Marblehead and Berlin Heights. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce tornadoes with little warning. Take shelter as this storm approaches your area.
